text: The Defender is a 2004 American British German Romanian action thriller movie directed by first time director Dolph Lundgren (who also stars). Also starring Jerry Springer, Shakara Ledard, Caroline Lee Johnson, Gerald Kyd, Leigh Zimmerman, Iddo Goldberg and Colin Tarrant. ==Other websites== * * Category:2004 action movies Category:2004 thriller movies Category:2000s action thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:British action thriller movies Category:German action movies Category:German thriller movies Category:Romanian action movies Category:Romanian thriller movies Category:Movies about terrorism Category:Movies set in Romania Category:Movies set in Washington, D.C. Category:Movies set in the 1990s Category:Movies directed by Dolph Lundgren
title: The Defender (2004 movie)
